55b6bad1-6ea7-4dc4-9acd-137278d518bf.description: The 4DX White Belt Coach Certification recognizes mastery of the 4 Disciplines of Execution to a level that demonstrates an ability to apply the principles within an organization. They not only have the knowledge to execute a strategic initiative within a team or organization, they also have invested significant time in exploring the practical implementation of the 4 Disciplines of Execution and overcoming the challenges that arise.
55b6bad1-6ea7-4dc4-9acd-137278d518bf.name: The Autodesk 4DX White Belt Coach Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Application: Recipients of this award have invested over 100 hours in learning and applying and can articulate the impact that the application has driven in a team or organization.
Online test under examination conditions that includes a written submission on the impact 4DX has had on the organization. 1:2:1 Interview and appraisal with a FranklinCovey 4DX Principal Consultant.
Professional Experience: Individuals who have earned this certificate have led or coached a team to success in executing goals amid competing priorities.

06c6a244-ff3c-446e-a259-b2b7ab5fe658.description: The 4DX Green Belt Coach Certification builds on the skills developed in the ‘4DX White Belt’ process and effectively represents an expert rather than foundational level of attainment in the adoption, adaptation, and optimisation of 4DX. The Green Belt level of 4DX Coach certification reflects the ability to drive performance in leaders of leaders as well as with front line team members. Green Belt is one step further on the 4DX mastery curve, an accreditation with true impact.
06c6a244-ff3c-446e-a259-b2b7ab5fe658.name: Autodesk 4DX Green Belt Coach Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Application: 3 months practical study and assessment, guided / shadowed coaching, critical appraisal of advice given, and measured impact of that coaching.
Assessment: Critiqued presentation of 4DX Leadership problem solving to an assessment panel.

2573fa91-edcf-4c5c-b5f4-47b87bf1f744.description: The Leader in Me end of course exams measure specific skills defined for each course based on the Leader in Me learning objectives for all students in Grades 9-12. This High School Exam Coordinator Certificate is awarded by FranklinCovey to individuals who complete High School Exam Coordinator course. This is a requirement before administering the exams to ensure the highest level of fidelity.
2573fa91-edcf-4c5c-b5f4-47b87bf1f744.name: Leader in Me High School Exam Coordinator Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the High School Exam Coordinator Course. The School Exam Coordinator Certification Course provide step-by-step instructions on how to navigate the online system and give detailed explanations about the key features of the software. The certifications are required to be completed by the Coordinator that will supervise any of the Leader in Me end of course exams. Each school must have at least one certified Coordinator and one certified Proctor to administer an exam.

09838257-37af-4678-98e4-8cd120af9662.description: The Mastery Certificate is awarded by FranklinCovey to a principle-centered leader who has excelled in mastering essential leadership skills from The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People®, The 4 Disciplines of Execution®, The 4 Essential Roles of Leadership™, and Leading at the Speed of Trust®. Score a passing grade on a proctored exam designed to test the level of comprehension of The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People®, The 4 Disciplines of Execution®, The 4 Essential Roles of Leadership™, and Leading at the Speed of Trust®.

Earn Competence Certificates for all 4 leadership courses. Complete written essays and schedule verbal interviews to discuss The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People®, The 4 Disciplines of Execution®, The 4 Essential Roles of Leadership™, and Leading at the Speed of Trust®.
Submit a resume with updated leadership credentials.
Schedule a final portfolio evaluation to discuss the experience as a principle-centered leader.
